text: Neil Warnock (born 1 December 1948) is an English football manager and former player who was most recently the manager of Championship club Huddersfield Town. ==Honours== ; Burton Albion * NPL Challenge Cup: 1984–85 ;Scarborough *Football Conference: 1986–87 ;Notts County *Football League Second Division play-offs: 1991 *Football League Third Division play-offs: 1990 ;Huddersfield Town *Football League Second Division play-offs: 1995 ;Plymouth Argyle *Football League Third Division play-offs: 1996 ;Sheffield United *Football League Championship runner-up: 2005–06 ;Queens Park Rangers *Football League Championship: 2010–11 ;Cardiff City *EFL Championship runner-up: 2017–18 Individual *Hartlepool United Player of the Year: 1971–72 season *Football Conference Manager of the Month: November 1986, December 1986 *Football Conference Manager of the Year: 1986–87 *EFL Championship Manager of the Month: December 2004, August 2005, September 2005, December 2008, August 2010, September 2010, March 2016, August 2017, February 2018, March 2018, October 2020 *BBC London Sports Personality of the Year: 2011 *LMA Special Achievement Award: 2017-18 ==Managerial statistics== Managerial record by team and tenure Team From To Record Burton Albion 18 February 1981 7 March 1986 Scarborough 1 August 1986 1 January 1989 Notts County 5 January 1989 14 January 1993 Torquay United 15 February 1993 13 May 1993 Huddersfield Town 15 July 1993 5 June 1995 Plymouth Argyle 22 June 1995 3 February 1997 Oldham Athletic 21 February 1997 7 May 1998 Bury 2 June 1998 2 December 1999 Sheffield United 2 December 1999 16 May 2007 Crystal Palace 11 October 2007 2 March 2010 Queens Park Rangers 2 March 2010 8 January 2012 Leeds United 20 February 2012 1 April 2013 Crystal Palace 27
